name: Ext_R5_Citation_ci_re_resourceReference
title: Cross-version Extension for R5.Citation.citedArtifact.relatesTo.resourceReference for use in FHIR R4B
description: This cross-version extension represents Citation.citedArtifact.relatesTo.resourceReference from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/Citation|5.0.0 for use in FHIR R4B.

element.short: What artifact, if not a conformance resource
element.definition: The related artifact, if the artifact is not a canonical resource, or a resource reference to a canonical resource.
element.comment: `Citation.citedArtifact.relatesTo.resourceReference` maps to R4B `Citation.citedArtifact.relatesTo.target[x]`. Has no type mapping So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget.

element.short: What artifact, if not a conformance resource
